name: 2nd International Conference on Aerospace, Defense and Mechanical Engineering
content: Engineering & Technology Conferences heartily invites across the globe to 2nd International Conference on Aerospace, Defense and Mechanical Engineering (Aerospace2020) schedule during August 17-18, 2020 at Copenhagen, Denmark a leading forum for Business professionals, Academic Professors, Scientists, Directors of companies,,Researchers, Industrialists, Delegates and Students in the field Aerospace and Défence to exchange information on their latest research progress and with a Theme “ To Explore Innovations in Space and Defence Systems” to cover almost all aspects and fields of Aerospace, Défence and Mechanical Engineering Sector.
